interestMainKh.title: តេស្តវាយតម្លៃតាម​ចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍
interestMainKh.desc: យល់ដឹងពីចំណាំអារម្មណ៍របស់អ្នកតាមរយះ Holland Theory បង្កើតឡើងដោយលោក John Holland
interestMainKh.buttonText: ចាប់ផ្តើមតេស្ត

introKh.title: តេស្តវាយតម្លៃតាម
introKh.highlight: ចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍
introKh.description: ដោយផ្អែកលើប្រភេទតេស្តនេះ អ្នកនឹងទទួលបានលទ្ធផលពីចំណាំអារម្មណ៍របស់អ្នកតាមរយះ Holland Theory​ បង្កើតឡើងដោយលោក John Holland  និងការណែនាំពីអាជីពការងារ ជំនាញដែលគួរជ្រើសរើសកាន់តែប្រសើរជាងមុន។

questions.question: I enjoy working with tools or machinery to solve problems.
I prefer doing hands-on tasks rather than working with abstract ideas.
I like solving complex problems that require deep thinking and research.
I am more interested in analyzing data and conducting experiments than in working with people.
I enjoy expressing myself through artistic activities like painting, writing, or music.
I prefer creating something new or original, like designing a website or writing a story.
I enjoy helping others and providing emotional support when needed.
I like being around people and prefer to work in a group rather than alone.
I enjoy persuading others to take action or to try new ideas.
I like taking on leadership roles and making decisions that affect others.
I prefer following rules and working in a structured environment.
I enjoy working with numbers, organizing data, and managing systems.

unis: Institute of science and technology advanced development

interestCard.title: Artistic
interestCard.desc: Creative and expressive individuals who enjoy working in artistic fields.

interestCard.title: Enterprising
interestCard.desc: Ambitious, energetic individuals who enjoy leading, persuading, and taking risks
